ai-kv3.1:1.3_0: Powers the Realised One, disciples, and Buddha (only) strength,
ai-kv3.1:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv3.1:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.

ai-kv3.1:4.3_0: The Realized One’s disciples is the precursor of the past. It is the precursor of the teaching the Dhamma, the way is the first way of teaching.

ai-kv3.1:5.3_0: The Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, has taught all-knowing and all-seeing, and having seen the Truth.”
ai-kv3.1:5.5_0: A disciple of the Buddha, the disciple of the Jotipāla, who knows and sees all-knowing and all-seeing, to know and see everything.
ai-kv3.1:5.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv3.1:6.3_0: The Realized One gave rise to the unarisen path, gave birth to the unborn path, explained the unexplained path. He was the knower of the path, the discoverer of the path, the expert on the path.
ai-kv3.1:6.5_0: Your teaching is the one who gave rise to the unarisen path, who gave birth to the unborn path, who explained the unexplained path. He is the knower of the path, the discoverer of the path, the expert on the path.
ai-kv3.1:6.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv3.1:7.1_0: the Realized One truly understands the faculties of thought,
ai-kv3.1:7.3_0: the disciple who knows all, sees all-knowing and all-seeing,
ai-kv3.1:7.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv3.1:8.1_0: if she knows that it is a reason;
ai-kv3.1:8.3_0: (There is) a reason why a disciple should know whatever position is recommended by him,
ai-kv3.1:8.4_0: “Knowledge the Realized One does truly know about the things that are capable of understanding.”
ai-kv3.1:9.1_0: A disciple of the past, future, and present in terms of causes and reasons.
ai-kv3.1:9.4_0: “Realizing, future, and present in terms of causes and reasons.”
ai-kv3.1:10.1_0: A disciple of the path finds a footing in all ways.
ai-kv3.1:10.3_0: (There is) a disciple of Sāketa who knows all the way to know,
ai-kv3.1:10.4_0: “Indeed I truly understand the path of practice accordingly.”
ai-kv3.1:11.1_0: Understanding the elements of many and diverse elements,
ai-kv3.1:11.3_0: If he is executed, he know about the world with its many and diverse elements,
ai-kv3.1:11.4_0: “The Realized One truly understands the world with its many and diverse elements.”
ai-kv3.1:12.1_0: Dependent opportunity from various sentient beings:
ai-kv3.1:12.3_0: If he knows that beings’ disciples were being struck with died, he should be told:
ai-kv3.1:12.4_0: “Knowledge Mastered by the Realized One, the disciple of the Realized One, the knowledge of the earth, and the disciple of all.”
ai-kv3.1:13.1_0: A disciple who has attained the absorptions, corruption, cleansing, and emergence regarding the absorptions, liberations, immersions, and attainments.
ai-kv3.1:13.3_0: If a disciple is being destroyed by one who knows about liberations, immersion, and attainments, he should be told to say:
ai-kv3.1:13.4_0: the Realized One has truly understood the knowledge of corruption, cleansing, and emergence regarding the absorptions, liberations, immersions, and attainments.”
ai-kv3.1:14.1_0: As a disciple recollects their past lives.
ai-kv3.1:14.3_0: (But) he knows “Oh, however should I prepare the Renunciation of previous lives he know
ai-kv3.1:14.4_0: “The knowledge of the recollection of the Realized One is the knowledge of this.”
ai-kv3.1:15.1_0: When sentient beings know and see sentient beings passing away and being reborn,
ai-kv3.1:15.3_0: and had been reborn in a disciple-born position, he know about this.
ai-kv3.1:15.4_0: “The Realized One has truly understood the knowledge of death and rebirth of sentient beings.”
ai-kv3.1:16.1_0: The Realized One has not ended the defilements,
ai-kv3.1:16.3_0: There is any difference between the Realized One or the disciple of the freedom of one and the ending of defilements.
ai-kv3.1:16.4_0: there’s no-one else who does not exist in nothing.
ai-kv3.1:16.5_0: So the Realized One can perform such things as this.
ai-kv3.1:16.6_0: “The Realized One truly understands the ending of defilements.”
